summary: The Delhi Capitals are a franchise cricket team that represents the city of Delhi in the Indian Premier League (IPL).

image.license: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 2.0 Generic license.

value.label: The Feroz Shah Kotla Ground is a cricket ground located at Bahadur Shah Zafar Marg, New Delhi. It was established in 1883 and is the second oldest international cricket stadium still functional in India.

image.altText: Image of Feroz Shah Kotla Ground
image.license: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 4.0 International license.

value.label: Delhi Daredevils had a good run in the inaugural edition of the IPL.They lost to eventual champions Rajasthan Royals in the semi final.

Despite dominating for the regular season, the Daredevils crumbled in the semi-final under a fierce batting by Aussie keeper Adam Gilchrist, who hit the joint 5th fastest fifty in IPL history (just 17 balls).
The Delhi Daredevils lost all first six matches of IPL 2013 and won their first match in seven games against the Mumbai Indians.

After losing their first match against the two-time Champions Kolkata Knight Riders, they went on to dominate Kings XI Punjab, Royal Challengers Bangalore, Defending Mumbai Indians, Kolkata Knight Riders in the second leg and newcomers Gujarat Lions.
In August 2013, Shikhar Dhawan recorded the then-second-highest individual score in a List A match when he scored 248 runs off 150 balls for India A against South Africa A at Pretoria

image.license: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 2.0 Generic license.

value.label: Colin Munro is a South-African born New Zealand international cricketer, who plays limited overs formats of the game.  He is the first player to score three Twenty20 International centuries.

value.label: Kagiso Rabada (born 25 May 1995) is a South African international cricketer who plays all formats of the game. Rabada, who is known by the nickname KG became the first cricketer to win six awards at Cricket South Africa's (CSA) annual dinner, including the prize for Cricketer of the Year in 2016.
Trent Alexander Boult is a New Zealand international cricketer who plays as a bowler.  He was the joint leading wicket taker at the 2015 Cricket World Cup.

value.label: Placed 4th at the 2008 Indian Premier League
Delhi Capitals were 3rd in the 2009 Indian Premier League
